grading_system.title: Uniform Recommended Grading System
grading_system.description: A student may earn five letter grades on the basis of his/her performance in a course. The letter grades A, B, C, and D are considered passing grades. The grade F is the failing grade.

special_grades.note: A 0 grade point in F Letter Grade is applied only for the calculation of the grade point average
